+ + const appointments = [ + { + id: 1, + clientName: "David Kimani", + clientPhone: "+254 700 123 456", + time: "10:00 AM", + service: "Classic Haircut", + price: 1500, + status: "confirmed", + date: "2024-01-15", + notes: "Regular customer" + }, + { + id: 2, + clientName: "Mary Wanjiku", + clientPhone: "+254 700 234 567", + time: "12:00 PM", + service: "Hair Styling", + price: 2000, + status: "confirmed", + date: "2024-01-15", + notes: "Wedding preparation" + }, + { + id: 3, + clientName: "Peter Otieno", + clientPhone: "+254 700 345 678", + time: "2:00 PM", + service: "Beard Trim", + price: 800, + status: "pending", + date: "2024-01-15", + notes: "First time customer" + }, + { + id: 4, + clientName: "Grace Muthoni", + clientPhone: "+254 700 456 789", + time: "4:00 PM", + service: "Hair Coloring", + price: 3500, + status: "confirmed", + date: "2024-01-15", + notes: "Color touch-up" + } + ]; + + const upcomingAppointments = [ + { + id: 5, + clientName: "James Mwangi", + clientPhone: "+254 700 567 890", + time: "9:00 AM", + service: "Hot Towel Shave", + price: 2000, + status: "confirmed", + date: "2024-01-16", + notes: "Special occasion" + }, + { + id: 6, + clientName: "Sarah Wanjala", + clientPhone: "+254 700 678 901", + time: "11:00 AM", + service: "Scalp Treatment", + price: 1800, + status: "pending", + date: "2024-01-16", + notes: "Monthly treatment" + } + ]; + + const completedAppointments = [ + { + id: 7, + clientName: "John Kamau", + clientPhone: "+254 700 789 012", + time: "9:00 AM", + service: "Haircut", + price: 1200, + status: "completed", + date: "2024-01-14", + notes: "Regular maintenance" + }, + { + id: 8, + clientName: "Jane Njeri", + clientPhone: "+254 700 890 123", + time: "1:00 PM", + service: "Hair Styling", + price: 1800, + status: "completed", + date: "2024-01-14", + notes: "Date night styling" + } + ]; + + const services = [ + "Classic Haircut", "Hair Styling", "Beard Trim", "Hot Towel Shave", + "Hair Coloring", "Scalp Treatment", "Mustache Styling", "Hair Wash" + ]; + + const timeSlots = [ + "9:00 AM", "9:30 AM", "10:00 AM", "10:30 AM", "11:00 AM", "11:30 AM", + "12:00 PM", "12:30 PM", "1:00 PM", "1:30 PM", "2:00 PM", "2:30 PM", + "3:00 PM", "3:30 PM", "4:00 PM", "4:30 PM", "5:00 PM", "5:30 PM" + ]; + + const handleAddAppointment = () => { + if (!newAppointment.clientName || !newAppointment.service || !newAppointment.date || !newAppointment.time) { + alert('Please fill in all required fields'); + return; + } + + // In a real app, this would save to a database + alert('Appointment added successfully!'); + setNewAppointment({ + clientName: '', + clientPhone: '', + service: '', + date: '', + time: '', + notes: '' + }); + setShowAddAppointment(false); + }; + + const getStatusColor = (status: string) => { + switch (status) { + case 'confirmed': return '#10b981'; + case 'pending': return '#f59e0b'; + case 'completed': return '#6b7280'; + case 'cancelled': return '#ef4444'; + default: return '#6b7280'; + } + }; + + const getStatusText = (status: string) => { + switch (status) { + case 'confirmed': return 'Confirmed'; + case 'pending': return 'Pending'; + case 'completed': return 'Completed'; + case 'cancelled': return 'Cancelled'; + default: return 'Unknown'; + } + }; + + const today = new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0]; + const todayAppointments = appointments.filter(apt => apt.date === today); + const totalEarnings = completedAppointments.reduce((sum, apt) => sum + apt.price, 0); + + return ( +
